technology.short_description: The thrumming power of a Herdstone invigorates the lowly Ungors’ thirst to take vengeance upon the world that spawned them.

effects.description: Leadership: +4 for Ungor Herd and Ungor Spearmen Herd units
Melee attack: +3 for Ungor Herd and Ungor Spearmen Herd units
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs, High Elves, Wood Elves, Dark Elves and Men

technology.short_description: Few Beastmen possess the skill or patience for ranged combat, but still value the bow as a tool of the hunt.

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Ungor Raiders units
Melee attack: +4 for Ungor Herd and Ungor Spearmen Herd units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Ungor Raiders units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The Beastmen will not rest until all are trampled beneath their cloven feet, and they alone rule the wilds.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
Leadership aura size: +25% during ambushes
Charge bonus: +10% for Gor, Tzaangor and Centigor units

technology.short_description: With thick hide and great horns, each Beastman is a heavily-muscled brute of preternatural toughness.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Gor Herd, God Gors and Bestigor Herd units
Bonus vs infantry: +4 for Gor units
Armour: +10 for Gor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Surrounding each settlement of the Old World is an impenetrable mass of gnarled forest, containing uncounted horrors…

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -10% during siege battles
Missile resistance: 10% during siege battles

technology.short_description: Adorned in pillaged armour, beaten to shape with hoof and fist, the warherd makes mock of men.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Warhounds, Harpies, Razorgor Herd and Manticore units
Armour: +10 for Manticore units
Ability: "Regeneration" for Manticore units
Fire resistance: 25% for Manticore units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The march of the brayherd gathers momentum, as the Cloven Ones cavort in the flickering flames of burning cities.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Minotaur units
Horde growth: +4

technology.short_description: Beastmen are creatures of atavistic fury, and it takes little to drive them into a frenzy of unbridled aggression.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur, Cygors, Giants, Incarnate Elemental of Beasts and Ghorgons
Attribute: Rampage for Bestigor units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Bestigor units
Attribute: Unbreakable for Bestigor units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

effects.description: Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The lowly Ungors have been gifted a spectacular growth of horns. They seek to honor the Dark Gods' gift with greater slaughter in battle.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Ungor units
Leadership: +10 for Ungor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: With the promise of enemy blood to consume, the Gors charge into battle at their Beastlord's command.

effects.description: Attribute: Stalk for Gor units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +20 for Gor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Beasts borne of Chaos magic, Manticores derive great pleasure from ripping into mortal flesh.

effects.description: Speed: +25% for Manticore units
Melee attack: +10 for Manticore units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The natural ferocity and raucousness of the Beastmen simmers just below the surface of the disciplined Bestigors, and when it is unleashed... well... you know.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Bestigor units
Speed: +10% for Bestigor units
Melee defence: +4 for Bestigor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Like wolves upon sheep, Beastmen prey upon all civilisation as they have since the beginning.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs, High Elves, Wood Elves, Dark Elves and Men
	(own armies factionwide)
Charge bonus: +20% when attacking

technology.short_description: The warherd bides its time to strike, as Ungors and Centigors pierce the hearts of the hated foe from afar.

effects.description: Ambush success chance: +10%
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The gangrel herd lopes alongside heavy chariots, eager to join battle as swiftly as possible.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Razorgor Chariots, Razorgor Herd and Tuskgor Chariots units
Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for Razorgor Chariots, Razorgor Herd and Tuskgor Chariots units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Should the monstrous please their Dark Masters they are blessed with a dark fortitude.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Ghorgon, Incarnate Elemental of Beasts and Giant units
Physical resistance: 10% for Ghorgon and Giant units
Speed: +10% for Ghorgon and Giant units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The Bray-Shamans reach out for tribal blessings, and Grandfather Nurgle answers their calls.

effects.description: Constant casualty replenishment rate: +5%
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Though they prefer to be on the offensive, the Cloven Ones are far more dangerous and savage when cornered.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 when defending
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Their enemies must strike with caution, for one wrong move could leave their weapon-arm impaled upon the beast's razor spines.

effects.description: Melee defence: +8 for Razorgor Chariots, Razorgor Herd and Tuskgor Chariots units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Sometimes the Dark Gods' gifts are subtle, and sometimes they are not.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Ghorgon, Incarnate Elemental of Beasts and Giant units
Weapon strength: +10% for Ghorgon and Giant units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Beastlords and Wargors have a swaggering confidence, revelling in their superiority over lesser beasts.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5
Leadership aura size: +25%
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Quick to temper and impossible to tame, such fierceness should be fostered if it cannot be controlled.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Centigors units
Melee defence: +5 for Centigors units
Reload and ammunition: +10% for Centigor units
Weapon strength: +10% for Centigor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The crude weapons of the Beastmen lack any finesse, but are wielded with brutal strength and unquenchable fury.

effects.description: Weapon Strength: +10% for Razorgor Herd units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Chaos Warhounds and Harpies units
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for Warhounds units
Melee defence: +4 for Harpies units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Towering over the battlefield hurling rune-etched remnants of Waystones, temples and monoliths, the Cygor's terrifying form blots out the sun.

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Cygor units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Cygor units
Weapon strength: +10% for Cygor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The Children of Chaos were created for one purpose: to bring about the destruction of mortal-kind.

effects.description: Character experience gain per turn: +250
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The only thing more dangerous than a Centigor is a drunken Centigor who thinks you might have more ale than him.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +20% for Centigor units
Speed: +20% for Centigor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Trained to execute their packmaster's commands, these warbeasts can serve a cunning Beastlord well.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 25% for Harpies units
Physical resistance: 10% for Warhounds units
Bonus vs large: +5 for Warhounds units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: A Cygor is all but blind in its eye, but there are rare instances when Tzeen may gift the sorry creature with a flash of true sight.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 20% for Cygor units
Melee defence: +8 for Cygor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The herd surges from darkling woods with speed enough to chase down any prey.

effects.description: Reinforcement range: +20%
Speed: +10% for all units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The Beastmen rule the forests; civilised races dare not venture beneath their dark eaves, lest they be devoured.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Fear when ambushing

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Leadership: +4 during ambushes
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: All servants of the Ruinous Powers – horned or no – crave the gaze of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 25% for Chaos Spawn units
Passive ability: "Regeneration" for Jabberslythe units
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Chaos Spawn units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Pity the poor defenders of Kalkengard, hung from its trees and ruined, rocky spires as meat for hungry Minotaurs.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +10 for Minotaur units
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Minotaur units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

effects.description: Ability: "Bolstered Attack" for Minotaur units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: Those with keen eyes are utilized to scout, watch over the Bloodgrounds, and bark warnings to their raucous brethren.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +10%
Missile resistance: 5%
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: All mortals fear the Cloven Ones, and can have this fear used against them.

effects.description: Hero action success chance: +10%
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The truly terrifying creatures, the ones even the Beastmen try to ignore, can be an invaluable asset... so long as their predations are directed toward the opposing army.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -33% for Jabberslythe units
Ability: "Pursuit of Battle" for Chaos Spawn units

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

effects.description: Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: The Beastmen lines stand firm against the enemy when bolstered by the voracious Minotaurs, as they know it will not be long before the foe are rent and hewn.

effects.description: Ability: "Bolstered Defence" for Minotaur units

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

effects.description: Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.short_description: When the tribes unite under the greatest chieftains, the ground shakes at the brayherd's march.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Guardian" for Lords and embedded Heroes

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

technology.short_description: Against the strength of the warherd, the regimented ranks of the civilised are as nothing. Smash their lines and defile their colours!

effects.description: Dread gained from battles: +20%

technology.short_description: An agent of the Chaos Gods, acting in their stead, will be granted favour… until they fail.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -50%
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
Campaign line of sight: +25%

technology.short_description: Just like their fury, the Cloven Ones' hunt is eternal; it never began, it shall never end. It always was.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Primal Fury Upgraded"

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

technology.short_description: Khorne's Bloodgrounds are littered with the dead, with many of the corpses beaten to a pulp post-mortem.

effects.description: Enable recruitment: Khorngors units in Herdstones settlements

technology.short_description: Only the most brutal and bloodthirsty Gors will answer this call, as rage overwhelmes their senses.

effects.description: Research rate: -25%
Spell resistance: 25% for Khorngors units
Bonus vs infantry: +10 for Khorngors units

technology.short_description: A deceptively lush and fertile land surrounds a herdstone of Nurgle, obscuring the plague and rot within.

effects.description: Enable recruitment: Pestigors units in Herdstones settlements

technology.short_description: Horrific wounds cannot fell a Pestigor, after they are gifted mutations far more advanced than their brethren.

effects.description: Research rate: -25%
Melee defence: +10 for Pestigors units
Fire resistance: 25% for Pestigors units

technology.short_description: The Beastmen sweep across their Blood-grounds, consumed by savage fury, tearing apart the hated foe!

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +15%

technology.short_description: Wielding the transformative power of Chaos, Bray-Shamans debase their foes and lend mutative strength to the herd.

effects.description: Chance of a plague spreading: -25%
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Transformation of Kadon"

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +1 for "Savage Dominion"

technology.short_description: The Cloven Ones cannot rest until all civilisation lies in ruin, and everything noble is trampled beneath their blood-encrusted hooves.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +20% when increasing
Miscast base chance: -20%

technology.short_description: Though they favour the flesh of men, the Beastmen are indiscriminate in their hatred of all civilised races.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to Lores of Beasts, Wild, Shadows and Death spells

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for Lores of Beasts, Wild, Shadows and Death spells

technology.short_description: Bestial chanting terrifies any sane passerby before they trespass too far into the Slaaneshi Bloodgrounds.

effects.description: Enable recruitment: Slaangors units in Herdstones settlements

technology.short_description: These pale and hairless creatures wear little armor, the better to sprint into battle and fulfill their murderous fantasies.

effects.description: Research rate: -25%
Bonus vs large: +15 for Slaangors units
Speed: +15% for Slaangors units

technology.short_description: Tzeentch's herdstones are never found in the same place twice, corrupting the land from within.

effects.description: Enable recruitment: Tzaangors units in Herdstones settlements

technology.short_description: Clever and conniving, the Tzaangors utilize their patron's blessing to outmaneuver and dispatch unprepared foes.

effects.description: Research rate: -25%
Ward save: 10% for Tzaangors units
Missile damage: +25% for Tzaangors units
